Room.Name: Lookout Point
Room.ShortDescription: You are at Lookout point, a northern section of the city of Oceancrest.
Room.LongDescription: This is the famous lookout point of the Lelion Beach and Park. It is the highest point in the western part of Oceancrest, and from here you can look east over the city and see most of the landmarks which have brought fame to this metropolis. As you look west, you see that the carnival and fair has arrived and pitched its tents on the eastern end of the peninsula which forms the park. The Nylandian Bay is located to the southwest, and you see many of the merchant vessels which visit the city docked there.
